title: Pelago Stavanger gets modern, more agile geometry and has more room for bikepacking gear
content:
The newest iteration of the Pelago Stavanger just hit the streets, and it looks like a head-turner. For those unfamiliar, Pelago — is a Helsinki-based bike and gear manufacture with eyes on gravel, randonneuring, and exploring fun on two wheels. The Stavanger — one of the company’s cornerstone offerings just got a refresh (the most

The post Pelago Stavanger gets modern, more agile geometry and has more room for bikepacking gear appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
